<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.password_reset" name="Self Service Password Reset" version="1.0.0" state="published" type="feature_set" help="Self_Service_Password_Reset_plugin" provider_name="ServiceNow" cache_flush="false"> <description> Self Service Password Reset plugin allows locally authenticated users to request a temporary password if they forget their current one. </description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glideapp.password_reset"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="PasswordResetUtil" class="com.glide.sys.authenticate.PasswordResetUtil"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Self Service Password Reset plugin allows locally authenticated users to request a temporary password if they forget their current one.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=Self_Service_Password_Reset_plugin</help> <id>com.snc.password_reset</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Self Service Password Reset</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.password_reset/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glideapp.password_reset</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.password_reset</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>false</trackable> <type>feature_set</type> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
